verbs.description: Nikki Haley , the US 's ambassador to the UN , [V: has] been embroiled in a controversy over an unsubstantiated rumor she had an affair with President Donald Trump .
Nikki Haley , the US 's ambassador to the UN , has [V: been] embroiled in a controversy over an unsubstantiated rumor she had an affair with President Donald Trump .
[ARG1: Nikki Haley , the US 's ambassador to the UN] , has been [V: embroiled] [ARG2: in a controversy over an unsubstantiated rumor she had an affair with President Donald Trump] .
Nikki Haley , the US 's ambassador to the UN , has been embroiled in a controversy over an unsubstantiated rumor [ARG0: she] [V: had] [ARG1: an affair with President Donald Trump] .
